item.title: How to start in cybersecurity
item.author: Ech0
item.description: Every person in this community was once a begginer and it’s usually a hard domain to begin with if you’re not guided. I will try to guide you through this article and give you some tips to start your cybersecurity journey. This article is for beginners. 1. The mindset First of all, before even talking about how to begin and where, you should answer this question: why? Typically: Why do you want to learn cybersecurity?
